about_the_game:
After the events of the main game, trust in the City's authorities has been shattered, and your detective agency is the only hope. Be prepared for risky operations, shady deals, and unexpected twists and turns! The interests of many parties and factions converge in this convoluted case, and it's unclear who can be trusted. Team up with old allies and bright new heroines to unravel the brewing conspiracy, but be prepared that there are more plans inside plans! Stay true to yourself, and you're sure to survive and get one step closer to the secrets of the Laughing Wizard.

✨ Don't let crime take over the City! ✨

The adventure continues in the second DLC, "The Crimes of Passion". What new forces are trying to take over the Сity? Who is pulling the strings? What secrets do the deceptively warm streets and gloomy mansions hold? Help restore law and order!

Return to the world of urban fantasy, where the struggle between the defenders of the law and criminals never stops.

⭐ A story about Duty, Honor, and Family

⭐ New girls to meet, battles and, of course, passion!

⭐ More hot animated sex scenes with original and new heroines!

⭐ Episodic characters from the main game will show themselves in all their glory!

⭐ A whole new location - Southside
